sen.j: 孫橋通（まごはしどおり）は京都市左京区南部の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Magohashi-dori Street is one of the east and west street in western part of Sakyo-Ward, Kyoto City.
Magohashi-dori Street is a street running east-west through the western part of Sakyo-Ward, Kyoto City.
Magohashi-dori Street is a street running east-west through the western part of Sakyo-Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 三条通の一筋北、東は新高倉通から西は川端通まで。
sen.e: The street is one block north from Sanjo-dori Street and it runs from Shintakakurabashi-dori Street at east to Kawabata-dori Street at west.
The street is one block north of Sanjo-dori Street and runs from Shintakakurabashi-dori Street in the east to Kawabata-dori Street in the west.
The street is one block north of Sanjo-dori Street and runs from Shintakakura-dori Street in the east to Kawabata-dori Street in the west.

sen.j: 東の延長上の古川町通までを孫橋通の名前で呼ぶことがある。
sen.e: Sometimes the extension street at east to the Furukawamachi-dori Street is called Magohashi-dori Street.
Sometimes the eastern extension in Furukawamachi-dori Street is called Magohashi-dori Street.
Sometimes the eastern extension in Furukawamachi-dori Street is called Magohashi-dori Street.

sen.j: さらに古川町通から東、神宮道までを三条北裏通（さんじょうきたうらどおり）と呼ぶ場合がある。
sen.e: Also, sometimes the street to east which is from Furukawamachi-dori Street to Jingumichi is called Sanjokitaura-dori Street.
Also, sometimes the street to the east which runs from Furukawamachi-dori Street to Jingumichi is called Sanjokitaura-dori Street.
Also, sometimes the street to the east which runs from Furukawamachi-dori Street to Jingumichi road is called Sanjokitaura-dori Street.

tit.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に修正

sen.j: 並河靖之七宝記念館 白川筋
sen.e: Namikawa Cloisonne Museum of Kyoto: Shirakawasuji
Namikawa Cloisonne Museum of Kyoto: Shirakawasuji
Namikawa Cloisonne Museum of Kyoto: Shirakawasuji

sen.j: 京都市営地下鉄東西線東山駅 (京都府) 古川町
sen.e: Higashiyama Station, Tozai Line of Tozai Line (Kyoto Prefecture): Furukawa cho
Higashiyama Station, Tozai Line of Tozai Line (Kyoto Prefecture): Furukawa cho

sen.cmt: Tozai Line of Tozai Line→the Tozai Line of Kyoto City Subwayに修正、Furukawa-choとしました。
